    • Uses of Upsert in org.apache.fluss.client.table

      Methods in org.apache.fluss.client.table that return Upsert 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Upsert FlussTable.newUpsert()  
      Upsert Table.newUpsert()
      Creates a new Upsert to build a UpsertWriter to upsert and delete data to this table (requires to be a Primary Key Table).
